title: Nails = Les Clous = Die Nagel
creator_credit: International Film Bureau and Kurt Aeschbacher
brief_description: An abstract statement on the problem of over population. A community of nails busily propagates, builds and spreads within a limited area. Eventually there is no more area for living and the nails rust and corrode. Music by Bruno Spoerri.
